title: [3DS] Final Fantasy Explorers [JPN]
description:
This is 3DS ROM #1459

Japanese title: Final Fantasy Explorers
Translated Jap title: Final Fantasy Explorers
English title: Final Fantasy Explorers

Released for the 3DS in Japan on 2014-12-18.

This is the japanese version of the game..

It does not utilize the 3DS's stereo-scopic 3D feature (usually the reason games don't support this is that would have to drop frame-rate to keep the game from lagging), so the game will be in 2D..

This game supports the new-3DS-exclusive control buttons:
C-stick = Control the camera view..
ZL button = Lock on to monsters..
ZR button = Lock on to summons..

This is a single .3ds file inside of a .7z archive file..

You will need a gateway card (or some kind of CFW) to run it on your 3DS..
Also, make sure your gateway software is updated to the newest version..
At the time of this writing you need to have your sysnand on 9.2.0 or lower.. However if you have 10.3 or lower, there is a way that you can downgrade your sysnand to 9.2.0. (You will need to research it on a site like gbatemp.net to figure out how to do it).. But if you are on sysnand 10.4 or higher, it is not possible (at the time of this writing) to downgrade or hack your 3DS..

I have confirmed it to work at least with this set up:
new-3DS
sysnand: 9.2.0
emunand: 10.4.0
gateway launcher software version: 3.7.1
